title: Silver Shore Valley
description:
Duke Silver takes on Jihan who is determined to protect his sister from an arranged marriage.Jihan KamranJihan marries the influential Duke of Silver Shore Valley and leaves his beloved home. Jihan must now find a way to forge a home in a tight-knit community. He must also work to fulfill the Emperor's demands to improve Silver Shore Valley's finances. The problem is that the valley's people are wary of him, and the Empress has found an ally who wants Jihan gone from the valley.Kastan Miran (Duke Silver):Kastan has brought Jihan to the valley and hopes to keep him happy and by his side for a long time. Until a sinister ally attacks his consort and sends him into a deadly race across a wild forest. Kastan must now confront an Empress to protect his family and maybe learn how to give Jihan sweet words.Will Kastan and Jihan prevail against their enemy?
This story is an MMRomance. The Reluctant Consort is set in a boy meets boy world.
author: Suilan Lee
